name: Body Swap
description:
Swaps places with the enemy in front of you to get behind them.
Command: L1 + Square button (square While guarding).

name: Resounding Lunge
description:
Ready your spear and build up your energy before unleashing a powerful strike forward. Charging this attack to its maximum strength will cause your strike to release a devastating shockwave.
Command: L1 + Square button (Square while guarding)

name: Tornado
description:
Strikes the ground with the butt of the wear. unleashing a shock wave. Press the attack button again to spin the spear and slash at foes.
Command: triangle button at end of combo.

name: Water Wheel
description:
Follows up a combo with a vertical spear strike that smashes down on the opponent. (Mid Stance Only).
Command: triangle button at end of combo

name: Relentless I
description: Maximum ki increases by +30 when you have a spear equipped as your main weapon.

name: Relentless II
description: Maximum Ki increases by +20 when you have a spear equipped as your main weapon.

name: Relentless III
description: Maximum Ki increases by +10 when you have spear equipped as your main weapon.

name: Entangle
description:
Sweeps an enemy's legs to knock them down. (Mid Stance only).
Command: L1 + triangle button (triangle while guarding)

name: Full Moon Kata I
description: While in full health, your melee damage increases by 3% when you have a spear equipped as your main weapon.

name: Full Moon Kata II
description: While in full health, your melee damage increases by 2% when you have a spear equipped as your main weapon.
prerequesite:
Full Moon Kata I
Cleared Mission ''The Sun Sets On Mount Tenno''.

name: Full Moon Kata III
description: While in full health, your melee damage increases by 1% when you have a spear equipped as your main weapon.
prerequesite:
Full Moon Kata II
Cleared Mission ''???''

name: Pole Kick
description:
Follows up a combo with a kick that uses your spear for support. (Mid/ Low stance only).
Command: Triangle button at end of combo

name: Wild Spear
description:
Charges forward while swinging the spear around.
Command: Hold X button while guarding
prerequesite:
Pole Kick
Cleared Mission ''The Sun Sets On Mount Tenno''

name: Flying Monkey
description:
Leaps over an enemy to get behind them. (Low stance only).
Command: L3 Up + X at end of combo.

name: Flying Monkey II
description: After Flying Monkey, lets you stab downward with an additional button press.

name: Back Slash
description:
Slashes enemy while stepping back (low Stance only).
Command: L1 + square button (square While guarding.

name: Rainbow Ruse
description: After a Ki Pulse, you can press the desired direction before using your spear to support you as you jump to evade the enemy. (Low stance only)

name: Cornered Boar I
description: When your health drops to 30% or lower, the damage you receive is reduced by 15% when you have a spear equipped as your main weapon

name: Cornered Boar II
description: When your health drops to 30% or lower, the damage you receive is reduced by 10% when you have a spear equipped as your main weapon
prerequesite:
Cornered Boar I
Cleared Mission ''The Sun Sets On Mount Tenno''

name: Cornered Boar III
description: When your health drops to 30% or lower, the damage you receive is reduced by 5% when you have a spear equipped as your main weapon

name: Spear Bash
description:
Use the butt of the spear to quickly throw the opponent off balance. (Low Stance only).
Command: Square button at end of combo.

name: Spear Shove
description:
Shoves an opponent using the spear's shaft, staggering them.
Command: L1 + triangle button (triangle While guarding)

name: Chidori
description:
Follows up a combo with a blow using the butt of the spear. If the attack reduces the enemy's Ki to zero, it will launch them into the air. (Press triangle button to perform additional attack).
Command: triangle button at end of combo.

name: Passage to the Afterlife I
description: Increases grapple damage by 4% when you have a spear equipped as your main weapon.

name: Passage to the Afterlife II
description: Increases grapple damage by 3% when you have a spear equipped as your main weapon.
prerequesite:
Passage to the Afterlife I
Cleared Mission ''The Sun Sets On Mount Tenno''.

name: Merciless Barrage
description:
Launches an opponent who is out of Ki into the air, and follows up with a powerful thrust attack.
Command: triangle button on opponent out of Ki.
prerequesite:
Passage to the Afterlife I
Cleared Mission ''???''

name: Passage to the Afterlife III
description: Increases grapple damage by 2% when you have a spear equipped as your main weapon.
prerequesite:
Passage to the Afterlife II
Cleared Mission ''???''

name: Rising Dragon
description:
After getting knocked down, press triangle button to attack while getting back up.
Command: triangle button while downed.

name: Armor Piercer I
description: Increases Final Blow damage by 4% when you have a spear equipped as your main weapon. Command: L1 + triangle button (triangle while guarding).

name: Armor Piercer II
description: Increases Final Blow damage by 3% when you have a spear equipped as your main weapon.
prerequesite:
Armor Piercer I
Cleared Mission ''The Sun Sets On Mount Tenno''.

name: Armor Piercer III
description: Increases Final Blow damage by 2% when you have a spear equipped as your main weapon.

name: Cornered Tiger I
description: When your health is below 30%, your melee damage will be increased by 15% when you have a spear equipped as your main weapon.

name: Cornered Tiger II
description: When your health is below 30%, your melee damage will be increased by 10% when you have a spear equipped as your main weapon.

name: Cornered Tiger III
description: When your health is below 30%, your melee damage will be increased by 5% when you have a spear equipped as your main weapon.

name: Twisting Spear
description: Twirls the spear around to gain momentum, then perform a single powerful strike.
prerequesite:
Spear Shove
Piercing Rain
Cleared Mission ''Sun Sets On Mount Tenno''

name: Piercing Rain
description:
Follows up a combo with a flurry of powerful blows, fiercely thrusting at the enemy five times. (High stance only).
Command: triangle button at end of combo.

name: Spearfall
description:
Follows up a combo with a horizontal slash, then slams the spear down on the enemy. (High stance only).
Command: triangle button at end of combo.

name: First Rule of Thrusting
description:
Damage of thrust attacks increases by 3% when you have a spear equipped as your main weapon. (High Stance Only).
Command: triangle button at end of combo.

name: Second Rule of Thrusting
description: Damage of thrust attacks increases by 2% when you have a spear equipped as your main weapon.
prerequesite:
First Rule of Thrusting
Cleared Mission ''The Sun Sets On Mount Tenno''.

name: Third Rule of Thrusting
description: Damage of thrust attacks increases by 1% when you have a spear equipped as your main weapon.
prerequesite:
Second Rule of Thrusting
Cleared Mission ''???''

name: Spear Flourish
description:
Knocks the enemy backwards when you perform a Ki Pulse. ( High stance only).
Command: Triangle button at end of combo.

name: Indomitable Spirit I
description: When your health drops to 30% or lower, your Ki recovery speed will be increased by 15% when you have a spear equipped as your main weapon.

name: Indomitable Spirit II
description: When your health drops to 30% or lower, your Ki recovery speed will be increased by 10% when you have a spear equipped as your main weapon.

name: Indomitable Spirit III
description: When your health drops to 30% or lower, your Ki recovery speed will be increased by 5% when you have a spear equipped as your main weapon.

name: Windmill
description:
Swings the blade around you in a wide circle, at its furthest reach (High Stance Only).
Command: L1+ triangle button (triangle while guarding).

name: Windmill II
description: Pressing and holding the button allows you to extend the duration of the spin. (High Stance Only)

name: Twirl
description:
Parries an enemy attack and knock them down. (Mid stance only).
Command: L1 +triangle button (triangle while guarding

name: Twirl II
description: When Twirl is successful, increases your attack power. (Mid stance only)

name: Shadow Strike II
description: Damage dealt to enemies from behind increases by 2% when you have a spear equipped as your main weapon.
prerequesite:
Shadow Strike I
Cleared Mission ''The Sun Sets On Mount Tennon''.

name: Shadow Strike III
description: Damage dealt to enemies from behind increases by 1% when you have a spear equipped as your main weapon.

name: Shadow Strike I
description: Damage dealt to enemies from behind increases by 3% when you have a spear equipped as your main weapon.
